section.title: What is an invoice?
section.p: An invoice is a commercial document issued by a seller to a buyer, it relates to a sale transaction and indicating the products, quantities, and agreed prices for products or services the seller had provided the buyer. Payment are usually made through invoices because it is sent through customers.
